prompt.text: Okay, we're about to begin.
Let's start on the first test case, calculating the number of lines to output.
Go ahead and begin working on the second test case.
Let's work on the third test case.
It's time to finish this up by passing the final test case.
We need to start wrapping up. Remember to type "ready" when you're ready to move on.
Okay, let's get ready to move on. Remember to type "ready" if you're done with this step.
Okay, we need to start wrapping this testcase up.
Time is almost up for this testcase. Complete it if you can.
It's time to move on from this testcase. You can come back to it later if there's time.
Type "ready" when you are ready to move on.
We will move on after a while or when everyone is ready.
When you've reached consensus in your group, type "ready".
Make sure your partner agrees before continuing.
We'll move to the next part once everyone is in agreement.
Thanks, [STUDENT]. Make sure your team is in agreement.
Okay, [STUDENT]. Make sure your team agrees.
Hang on until your team is ready, [STUDENT].
Thanks, [STUDENT]. Hang on until your team is ready...
Okay, let's move on...
Moving on...
Onward!
You've past the testcase!
Testcase passed!
Way to go! You've passed the testcase.
Good job. You've passed the testcase.
When you have copied your data into the spreadsheets, we'll continue.
We'll move on when everyone is ready.
Once you've read this and discussed it with your team, type "ready".
When everyone is comfortable with this material, type "ready".
